meanings.definition: A competition or game in which people or teams compete against each other.
meanings.sent1: The school held a fun contests to see who could run the fastest.
meanings.sent2: She won the singing contests by performing a beautiful song.
meanings.sent3: The contests for the best costume at the party were hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The contests between the two rival teams were like a battle on the field.
meanings.sent5: The memory of winning the contests stayed with her forever.

meanings.definition: To engage in a competition or game.
meanings.sent1: He contests in the swimming race every year.
meanings.sent2: They will contests in the chess tournament next week.
meanings.sent3: She contests with her brother in a friendly game of basketball.
meanings.sent4: The two friends contests in a game of cards for fun.
meanings.sent5: Contestsing in the spelling bee was nerve-wracking but exciting.

meanings.definition: To dispute or challenge the validity or truth of something.
meanings.sent1: She contests the decision made by the judges.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer contests the evidence presented in court.
meanings.sent3: He contests the idea that dogs are better than cats.
meanings.sent4: The scientist contests the theory proposed by his colleague.
meanings.sent5: Contestsing the results of the experiment led to a heated debate.
